price: Muvugishwamana! Bwira indyarya uti: “Ihunga ryanyu ry’urugamba ku mvo zo gutinya urupfu canke ukwicwa, ntirizotuma murenga umusi warwo hageze gupfa, kandi ntimuzoryoherwa n’ivy’isi, kiretse akanya gato mwagenewe kubaho hanyuma mupfe, ni n’akanya gato cane katogereranywa n’ubuzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa”.
arabic: قُل لَّن يَنفَعَكُمُ ٱلۡفِرَارُ إِن فَرَرۡتُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ أَوِ ٱلۡقَتۡلِ وَإِذٗا لَّا تُمَتَّعُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

meta.transliteration: qul lan yanfaʿakumu al-firāru in farartum mina al-mawti awi al-qatli wa-idhan lā tumattaʿūna illā qalīlan
translations: you will be allowed to enjoy
